faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.description: Everything you need to know about create-eksa-app

what.question: What is create-eksa-app?
what.answer: create-eksa-app is a modern fullstack Next.js starter template that includes TailwindCSS, Shadcn/UI, Drizzle ORM, Auth.js, and next-intl for internationalization. It provides a solid foundation for building web applications with best practices.

free.question: Is create-eksa-app free to use?
free.answer: Yes, create-eksa-app is completely free and open source. You can use it for personal or commercial projects without any restrictions.

technologies.question: Do I need to know all the included technologies?
technologies.answer: While familiarity with Next.js and React is recommended, create-eksa-app is designed to be approachable for developers of all skill levels. The documentation provides guides for each included technology.

customization.question: Can I customize the template?
customization.answer: create-eksa-app is designed to be a starting point. You can add, remove, or modify any part of the template to suit your project's needs.

deployment.question: How do I deploy a project bootstrapped with create-eksa-app?
deployment.answer: create-eksa-app projects can be deployed to any platform that supports Next.js, such as Vercel, Netlify, or your own server. The documentation includes deployment guides for popular platforms.
